definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to change positions/to shift one's ground

sentences.english: So is an change for the better, like birth and death which convulse the body.
sentences.chinese: 向更好的轉變也是如此，和顛覆身體的生死一樣。

sentences.english: No problem is permanent storms always give way to the sun.
sentences.chinese: 風暴總會給陽光讓路，寒冬總會轉變爲暖春。

sentences.english: China is transforming the world as it transforms itself.
sentences.chinese: 中國正在像轉變自身那樣來轉變世界。

sentences.english: China is transforming the world as it transforms itself.
sentences.chinese: 中國正在像轉變自身那樣來轉變世界。

sentences.english: AMERICA'S political priorities have undergone a breathtaking about-turn.
sentences.chinese: 美國政治上優先考慮的事情已然經歷了一個大轉變。

sentences.english: Touch and move trigger of catapult and see changes of power.
sentences.chinese: 觸摸和移動觸發彈射器，看到力的轉變。

sentences.english: From time to time, some of my readers take a stab at converting me to their religion.
sentences.chinese: 我的一些讀者時常嘗試把我轉變成他們的宗教的信徒。

sentences.english: The two switch regions move the most.
sentences.chinese: 連個轉變區移動地最多。

sentences.english: How quickly their shrieks of pain turn to enraptured adulation.
sentences.chinese: 它們痛苦的尖叫迅速轉變成對吾等恩賜的狂熱諂媚。

sentences.english: China water conservancy is changing from engineering style to resource style.
sentences.chinese: 中國水利正由工程型向資源型轉變。

sentences.english: Have taken place in people's consumption of a major change.
sentences.chinese: 人們的消費觀念已經發生了較大的轉變。

sentences.english: It may be possible, then, to bring about a change in the US position.
sentences.chinese: 因此，美國轉變立場的可能性還是存在的。

sentences.english: Transnationalism designates a recent shift in migration bird patterns.
sentences.chinese: 跨國主義者指出了一個最近發生遷徙鳥類上的轉變。

sentences.english: The more the fiber volume fraction is, the lower the critical temperature T crit .
sentences.chinese: 纖維體積分數越大，所需臨界轉變溫度越低。

sentences.english: Switch to whole-wheat couscous and pasta
sentences.chinese: 轉變去食用全麥製作的粗麥粉和通心粉。

sentences.english: One option is to shift trade facilitation from a negotiation to a development plan.
sentences.chinese: 一種方案是將貿易便利化從談判轉變爲發展計劃。

definition: to change direction/fig. to change one's stance
to get lost/to lose one's way
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
